sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Walt Disney ( DIS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.7%.
Year to date, Walt Disney registers a 25.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is International Business Machines ( IBM ), trading down 1.1%.
International Business Machines is lower by about 14.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Microsoft ( MSFT ), trading down 0.8%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 0.7% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
